__e: I'm sorry I ignored you back at the house.
I am really sorry that I ignored you all that time.
Oh, I wanted to believe what he was saying so badly, I missed all the signs.
That made you focus on the evidence that helped, and ignore the evidence that hurt.
And you cannot continue to ignore the threat of the humans on Earth.
You ignored the instructions I sent from prison.
I did, I ignored it... and you did too...
The guy you ignored and made fun of?
And then they would ignore me and it would make me really angry.
I've tried to get that guy's attention, like, three times before and he ignores me.
She still isn't talking to me because I put a little wager on her breaking up...
This was really hard for me.
Those horses in England weren't ignoring everyone else, they were targeting you.
Just ignore her, and we'll have fun, okay?
I could tell you that given a week to study your father... and the ways in which he ignores you...
These forces can't be ignored any longer. They have to be verified and accepted once and for all. Thank you.
"This may be hard to believe, but the history can't be ignored.
Because then it can't be ignored anymore.
